data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a support module for Chess::PGN::EPD 0.01 To generate
    positional information from a game score, you more or less have to
    'play' the game in order to disambiguate the move notation. Moves.pm
    contains all of the possible move tables that makes such a task
    reasonable. There is no other module of this nature.
